The article features a photo of a flyer: 2. The flyer itself was shared on social media platforms like Facebook and Instagram prior to the election.
Antifa Checker: a Twitter account that verifies real Antifa accounts, debunked the theories surrounding the flyer as false.
Antifa: as a movement, focuses on vocalizing people to protest after the election and monitoring far-right groups, rather than planning nationwide actions like those depicted in the flyer.
